events.title: Francis Ouimet wins the golf U.S. Open

movie.title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
movie.plot: Near the turn of the twentieth century, young Harry Vardon becomes a champion golfer but learns that his amazing skill is no match for the class boundaries that exclude him from "gentlemanly" English society. A dozen years later, a young American, Francis Ouimet, fights against the same prejudice, as well as his own father's disdain, for a chance to participate in the U.S. Open against his idol -- Harry Vardon. The struggles of both men for acceptance provides the background for an amazing contest of skills.

movie.title: The Untouchables
movie.plot: 1920's prohibition Chicago is corrupt from the judges downward. So in going up against Al Capone, Treasury agent Eliot Ness picks just two cops to help him and his accountant colleague. One is a sharp-shooting rookie, the other a seen-it-all beat man. The four of them are ready to battle Capone and his empire, but it could just be that guns are not the best way to get him.

events.title: Ip fights at the Mid Autumn Festival

movie.title: Ip Man 4: The Finale
movie.plot: The Kung Fu master travels to the U.S. where his student has upset the local martial arts community by opening a Wing Chun school.

events.title: Billie Jean King beats Bobby Riggs at tennis

movie.title: Battle of the Sexes
movie.plot: The true story of the 1973 tennis match between World number one Billie Jean King and ex-champ and serial hustler Bobby Riggs.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 3 wins & 19 nominations.

movie.title: Paranormal Activity
movie.plot: After a young, middle class couple moves into a suburban 'starter' tract house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be somehow demonic but is certainly most active in the middle of the night. Especially when they sleep. Or try to.

events.title: the General's report is leaked to the public

movie.title: War Machine
movie.plot: A general from the US is sent to Afghanistan to 'clean' the situation up after eight years of war in the country. He finds himself amongst tired soldiers and disillusioned politicians eager to leave. In this situation he feels his mission is to 'win' the war, something deemed impossible by everyone around him.

movie.title: The Shape of Water
movie.plot: An other-worldly story, set against the backdrop of Cold War era America circa 1962, where a mute janitor working at a lab falls in love with an amphibious man being held captive there and devises a plan to help him escape.
